mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(title, contents, name, longitude, latitude, region_1st_name, region_2nd_name, region_3rd_name, region_4th_name, publishedDate) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{name}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{region_1st_name}, #{region_2nd_name}, #{region_3rd_name}, #{region_4th_name}, #{publishedDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, region_1st_name = #{region_1st_name}, region_2nd_name = #{region_2nd_name}, region_3rd_name = #{region_3rd_name}, region_4th_name = #{region_4th_name}, publishedDate = #{publishedDate} WHERE id = #{id}
